hero.title: Enclave Node NFT Platform
hero.subtitle: Become part of the network. Get Enclave's token production and transaction fees. Together building the future of privacy computing.
hero.connectWallet: Connect your wallet to get started

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Simple, transparent, and profitable. Become part of Enclave's decentralized privacy network.

step1.title: Mint NFT
step1.description: Pay USDT to mint a Node NFT and receive additional $E

step3.title: Staking Rewards
step3.description: Automatically stake to privacy computing PoW network, receive daily $E rewards

step4.title: Trade Shares
step4.description: One NFT is split into multiple shares, trade shares on the marketplace anytime

nftTypes.subtitle: Choose the node that fits your investment strategy

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.step0: Automatically connect to zero-knowledge proof PoW node as beneficiary
howItWorks.step1: Pay {price} USDT and get {amount} $E production quota
howItWorks.step2: Receive daily $E production and USDT rewards
howItWorks.step3: After 1 year, 4% of $E quota unlocks monthly for 25 months

summary.title: Mint Summary
summary.confirmTransaction: Please confirm the transaction in your wallet

termination.cooldownInfo: After initiating termination, there is a 1-day cooldown period

whitelist.title: Whitelist Management
whitelist.whitelistedDescription: You have successfully joined the whitelist and can mint NFTs
whitelist.enterInviteCode: Please enter an invite code to join the whitelist
whitelist.activeDescription: Activated, can be used to invite others
whitelist.pendingDescription: Your invite code application is under review, please wait patiently
whitelist.noInviteCode: You don't have an invite code yet. After applying, you can use it to invite others to join the whitelist
whitelist.invalidInviteCode: Invalid invite code or it has been revoked
whitelist.applicationSubmitted: Invite code application submitted, please wait for review

mintStatus.waitForNextBatch: Please wait patiently for the next batch to open for minting
